Connect to FlashArray.description: Connect to a FlashArray using the Pure Storage PowerShell SDK v2.x.

Run a FlashArray CLI Command.description: Enables the execution of a CLI command on a FlashArray via an SSH connection.

Create a FlashArray Protection Group.description: Creates a Protection Group on a FlashArray.

Create a new FlashArray volume.description: Creates a new volume with specified size (in bytes) on a FlashArray.

Create a snapshot of a Protection Group.description: Creates a new snapshot of a FlashArray Protection Group.

Creates a new Protection Group Volume.description: Creates a new volume in a FlashArray Protection Group. Multiple MemberNames must be comma seperated.

Create FlashArray volume snapshot.description: Creates a snapshot of a FlashArray volume. Multiple SourceNames must be comma seperated.

Create Host with Fibre Channel WWNs.description: Creates a new FlashArray host with the specified comma-delimited Fibre Channel WWNs.

Create host with iSCSI IQNs.description: Creates a new FlashArray host with the specified comma-delimited iSCSI IQNs

Create FlashArray Host Group.description: Creates a new Host Group on the FlashArray.

Add Host(s) to FlashArray Host Group.description: Adds specified host(s) to Host Group on a Flasharray. $MemberNames can be comma-delimited list.
